name: Before the Strom
description:
The main character is just living his usual life, with his dad and brother, in a town that is close to the mountains. Until one day...

My novel is still in development, and a lot has been done unfinished, and some even on purpose. 

I did so because I don't have much time to work on it because of college, but I'd like to release at least an Alpha to hear feedback and gain a small audience.

In the future, I plan to drew backgrounds, update sprites, improve quality of text, sounds, maybe even add music and maybe make a custom interface. And of course discord, patreon etc.

I hope you like it, enjoy the game. <3

You can change language on English in the settings!

ps. my dum-dum head, at 1am, chose wrong setting for chat, and now if I change it, all messages will be deleted. So I'll leave it that way for now, but when the first (complete) public build is released I'll change the settings.

2 ps. I managed to make an Android version, but I'm not sure if it works correctly. Let me know if there are any problems.
